p: The mRNA expression of histone methyltransferase ezh1 gene was lower in the mandarin fish of Group X (Fig. 5a). As histone methyltransferase Ezh1 could methylate ‘Lys-27’ of histone H3, we analyzed the H3K27me3 levels of the two groups. The results showed that H3K27me3 level was also lower in the mandarin fish of Group X than that of Group W (Fig. 5b).
